alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 5:41AM AKST until December 27 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain occurring. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Additional snow accumulations of 2 inches, and ice accumulations less than one tenth of an inch are expected. * WHERE...Denali. * WHEN...Until noon today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Winds, snow and freezing rain will end this afternoon and conditions will improve then. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
